data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Lille needs to be cautious. Bordeaux have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
Lille are whistled for offside.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Lille.
Can Lille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bordeaux's half?
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Bordeaux.
Lille's Burak Yilmaz gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bordeaux defender.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 12, Eric Wattellier signals a Lille throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
In Lille Bordeaux drive forward through Hatem Ben Arfa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Bordeaux.
In the minute 12, Lille to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lille.
In the minute 16, Lille have a dangerous throw-in.
Jonathan Bamba is on target to give Lille a 1-0 advantage.
Great play from Jonathan Ikone to set up the goal.
In the minute 18, Eric Wattellier awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Lille close to the penalty box.
Eric Wattellier signals a throw-in for Lille, close to Bordeaux's area.
In the minute 20, Can Lille capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jonathan Ikone of Lille gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 23, Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 24, Nicolas De Preville (Bordeaux) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Bordeaux in Lille.
In the minute 28, Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
In the minute 29, Toma Basic levels the score at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Hatem Ben Arfa.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 32, In Lille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Lille.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 34, Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Lille.
In the minute 37, Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
Lille have a dangerous throw-in.
Lille are pushing forward but Burak Yilmaz's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 38, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Lille.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 41, Eric Wattellier signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Lille's half.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
Eric Wattellier awards Lille a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Throw-in high up the field for Lille in Lille.
Lille attack but Burak Yilmaz's header doesn't find the target.
Bordeaux have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Lille pushes forward through Jonathan Ikone, whose finish on goal is saved.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Eric Wattellier blows to end the first-half.
Lille's Jose Fonte scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 45, Jonathan Bamba with an assist there.
The second half has started at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Bordeaux.
Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lille needs to be cautious. Bordeaux have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 48, Eric Wattellier awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
Eric Wattellier awards the home team a throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bordeaux close to the penalty box.
In the minute 50, Bordeaux's Hatem Ben Arfa misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lille.
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Lille in the half of Bordeaux.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Lille's Burak Yilmaz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Lille's Jonathan David is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 59, Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Burak Yilmaz (Lille) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Bordeaux at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
The home team have replaced Jonathan David with Yusuf Yazici. This is the first substitution made today by Christophe Galtier.
Throw-in for Lille close to the penalty box.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Yacine Adli is replacing Toma Basic for Bordeaux at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Bordeaux make their second substitution with Hwang Ui-Jo replacing Mehdi Zerkane.
Jean-Louis Gasset is making the team's third substitution at Stade Pierre Mauroy with Jimmy Briand replacing Nicolas De Preville.
In the minute 65, Eric Wattellier signals a Lille throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Bordeaux.
Lille are coming forward and Jonathan Ikone gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 67, Lille have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
In the minute 70, Eric Wattellier awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Bordeaux.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 78, Christophe Galtier (Lille) is making a second substitution, with Tim Weah replacing Jonathan Ikone.
The home team replace Boubakary Soumare with Xeka.
Lille are caught offside.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Bordeaux.
Corner awarded to Lille.
Lille drive upfield and Yusuf Yazici gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bordeaux defender.
In the minute 82, Lille have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Lille to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 83, Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Josh Maja is replacing Remi Oudin for Bordeaux at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Jean-Louis Gasset (Bordeaux) is making a fifth substitution, with Enock Kwateng replacing Youssouf Sabaly.
In the minute 83, Tiago Djalo is on a sub for Zeki Celik for Lille.
Hwang Ui-Jo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bordeaux.
Yusuf Yazici of Lille smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 87, Lille have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
In Lille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bordeaux's Paul Baysse has been booked in Lille.
In the minute 89, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tiago Djalo (Lille) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
